mapper.insert: insert into log_login( account, type, user_id, device_number, model, level, address, login_device, download, result, log_time ) values ( #{account}, #{type}, #{userId}, #{deviceNumber}, #{model}, #{level}, #{address}, #{loginDevice}, #{download}, #{result}, #{logTime} )
insert into log_post(user_id, operation, log_time) values (#{userId}, #{operation}, #{logTime})

insert into log_bill( user_id, product_code, old_currency, new_currency, price, price_type, status, remark, log_time ) values ( #{userId}, #{productCode}, #{oldCurrency}, #{newCurrency}, #{price}, #{priceType}, #{status}, #{remark}, #{logTime} )
